special_powers.name: Iron Avengers, Assemble
special_powers.description: The bystanders printed on this map are 'Iron Avengers'. At the beginning of the game, choose a friendly character of 50 points or more. That characer has 'POWER: Roll a d6. If the result is odd, generate the matching Iron Avengers in the square equal to the result if that Iron Avenger isn't already on the map. If EAX #056 Iron Man is on your starting force, he must be the chosen character. If so, he can't otherwise generate Iron Avengers. Instead, this Location bonus is a FREE action and he generates an Iron Avenger on any result (not just on odd number results). 1: Tank 2: Monolith 3: Crimson Sage 4: Steelbow 5: Bolt 6: Sting

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate a Tank, Crimson Sage, or Bolt bystander in your starting area.

special_powers.name: The Living Spirits Will Guide Us
special_powers.description: Once per turn, a friendly character occupying hindering, obscuring, or water terrain may reroll its d6 roll for either Blades/Claws/Fangs or Super Senses. If a character named Black Panther is on your force or your force is an Animal themed team, friendly character's Blades/Claws/Fangs and Super Senses have Protected: Outwit.

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: Once per game, you may reroll a friendly character's roll for Blades/Claws/Fangs. Once per game, you may reroll a friendly character's roll for Super Senses.
